subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki scored a season-high 38 points, including two free throws with 10.2 seconds left, to help the Dallas Mavericks beat the Jazz, 108-105, last night in Salt Lake City.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki scored a season-high 38 points, including two free throws with 10.2 seconds left, to help the Dallas Mavericks beat the Jazz, 108-105, last night in Salt Lake City.
